attributes.action: Accept the tanks of the British people for his fresh approach to openess and democratic participation.In particular the willingness to re engage with voluntary and community groups is welcomed.The petitioners call on Gordon Brown to ensure the fullest possible publicity is given to this new approach.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition represents a new approach to the use of petitions ,in that it seeks a way to welcome Gordon Brown and his approach to Government.
